articles.description: India's men's basketball team lost 70-73 to Kazakhstan in a thrilling match to have their winning run halted in the FIBA Olympic Pre-Qualifying Tournament Asia 2023. They have climbed to the top
articles.content:
India suffered a last-minute heartbreak to lose 70-73 to Kazakhstan in the FIBA Olympic Pre-Qualifying Tournament Asia 2023 on Monday.
